snippet.textDisplay: I remember ordering my Model 2 Genesis off of Amazon (because model 2 was cheaper) and receiving it in the mail along with Sonic 2 and being SOOO excited! A couple weeks later, I spent like a total of $100 on Genesis games. Such a memorable moment. Of course, this didn't happen in the 90's, so it doesn't quite have that nostalgia factor yet. I guess I'll just have to wait 15 years... Sigh...
snippet.textOriginal: I remember ordering my Model 2 Genesis off of Amazon (because model 2 was cheaper) and receiving it in the mail along with Sonic 2 and being SOOO excited! A couple weeks later, I spent like a total of $100 on Genesis games. Such a memorable moment. Of course, this didn't happen in the 90's, so it doesn't quite have that nostalgia factor yet. I guess I'll just have to wait 15 years... Sigh...

snippet.textDisplay: I agree with you that Chemical Plant Zone is by far the best song in any Sonic game, but I'm surprised there aren't more songs from this game on the list... this game had a great soundtrack, probably the best on the Genesis in my opinion.

snippet.textDisplay: 2 is easily still my favorite Sonic, though I feel Generations could've topped it if they had more stages to that one(maybe more games represented and a couple of stages per game, one voted by Sonic Team, one voted by the fans). If that were the case, Sonic Generations would be hands down the best and one of my favorite games of all time. Honestly it might even be nice to have other playables(BUT kept simple, and only as bonus unlockables). But that's just me. Others may feel different.
snippet.textOriginal: 2 is easily still my favorite Sonic, though I feel Generations could've topped it if they had more stages to that one(maybe more games represented and a couple of stages per game, one voted by Sonic Team, one voted by the fans). If that were the case, Sonic Generations would be hands down the best and one of my favorite games of all time. Honestly it might even be nice to have other playables(BUT kept simple, and only as bonus unlockables). But that's just me. Others may feel different.

snippet.textDisplay: I've had pretty weird schedules these days, which explains the unusual upload times. Anyways, I still think Chemical Plant Zone's theme is above any other music in the 16-bit Sonic games, but they still had a lot of other classics. I remember Metropolis Zone being challenging but still enjoyable. I also liked the graphics in that zone (the background and because there was a lot of green, my favorite color as a kid).
snippet.textOriginal: I've had pretty weird schedules these days, which explains the unusual upload times. Anyways, I still think Chemical Plant Zone's theme is above any other music in the 16-bit Sonic games, but they still had a lot of other classics. I remember Metropolis Zone being challenging but still enjoyable. I also liked the graphics in that zone (the background and because there was a lot of green, my favorite color as a kid).
